title: Become Organized
description: Custom made website for a dentist practice. Focus is on simple design, and allowing the business to edit information on the fly with a CMS. Built using Contentful and Gatsby.

title: Childish Gambino
description: Improved the website of psychotherapist Henriette Galst. Work included design optimizations and improving the CMS experience. Built with WordPress.

title: Chrome Extension
description: A website to support my online IT support business. The page serves as a way for customers to get in touch. Developed using Gatsby and TailwindCSS.

title: Motion Design Reel
description: A webapp to browse subreddits that are interesting to the user by taking posts from a list of subreddits and sorting them by upvotes.

title: Cricket All-Stars
description: Search for Youtube videos and download them directly on to your machine. Uses a NodeJS server on the backend, with Vue and TailwindCSS on the frontend.

title: MLB Network
description: A movie browser with inbuilt watchlist functionality. Uses localstorage to store movies on a watchlist between browser sessions. Built with ReactJS.
